content:
Mustang News

Cal Poly San Luis Obispos News Source

Free COVID19 testing is available in Grover Beach and Paso Robles for California residents according to county health officials PERIOD

Patients do not need to have insurance to receive a test PERIOD

In order to be eligible for a test residents must belong to one of the following groups of people according to the county

Free testing is available Monday through Friday from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD at the Paso Robles Veterans Hall and the Ramona Garden Community Center in Grover Beach according to the county PERIOD

To make an appointment for a test residents can register at emergencyslo.org or by calling  PERIOD If the patient has insurance their insurance will be charged but they will not be charged a copay the website read PERIOD

Appointments last about five minutes the website read PERIOD

Testing is available Monday through Friday from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD at the Paso Robles Veterans Hall and the Ramona Garden Community Center in Grover Beach according to the county PERIOD

Patients are not required to wear a mask or bring an insurance card to the appointment but the county recommends that they bring a drivers license or identification card if they have one PERIOD

Expanding testing may cause an increase in confirmed cases of COVID19 County Public Health Officer Penny Borensteain said PERIOD

By offering more tests the county will detect COVID19 cases that would have previously gone undetected potentially causing the increase in confirmed COVID19 cases PERIOD

In addition to monitoring the number of cases in San Luis Obispo the county will monitor the severity of cases and the hospitalization rate of patients Borenstein said PERIOD

While we may see increases in the number of cases Borenstein said We are hopeful that we will retain the low numbers that weve had in critical care especially in hospitals. your email address will not be published PERIOD Required fields are marked

title: Free COVID-19 testing now available in San Luis Obispo - Mustang News
name: California Polytechnic State University, SLO
